long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OBL: Check for problems with Amazon FBA shipments

Get your money back for discrepancies in delivered Amazon FBA Shipments! 
This extension is for Amazon sellers who uses FBA. Extension works seamlessly within your Amazon Seller Central. This extension helps to find the difference between Shipped & Received by discovering troubled Shipments in Amazon Seller Central.

To use, install and activate the extension. 
Then log in to your Amazon Seller Central account, then go to Inventory > Manage FBA Shipments > click the extension icon and you will see all problem Shipments highlighted in red color in the Received column. To request an investigation with Amazon - click on the name of the troubled shipment and open the case where appropriate.
